com.totalcross.knowcode.parse

Class XmlContainerLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • totalcross.ui.gfx.GfxSurface
      • totalcross.ui.Control
        • totalcross.ui.Container
          • com.totalcross.knowcode.parse.XmlContainerLayout
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    XmlContainerConstraintLayout, XmlContainerFrameLayout, XmlContainerLinearLayout, XmlContainerRelativeLayout

    public abstract class XmlContainerLayout
extends totalcross.ui.Container
    XmlContainerLayout is a super class that abstracts the common methods to specialized classes of layout.

    It uses SAX is a standard interface for event-based XML parsing with the XmlReader class, used to read HTML or XML documents, reporting events to handlers ContentHandler

    Here is an example of create a new Totalcross Container Screen from a XML file. XmlContainerFactory read the XML file and instantiate the specialized class of XmlContainerLayout: 

            public void initUI(){
                Container container = XmlContainerFactory.create("linearSample.xml");
                MainWindow.getMainWindow().swap(container);
                Control control = ((XmlContainerLayout) container).getControlByID("@+id/btRegister");
 control.setFont(Fonts.latoBoldDefaultSize);
        }
